price: 72. Biyo kulul oo karaya dhexdood, haddana Naar baa laga buuxin oo hurin.
arabic: فِي ٱلۡحَمِيمِ ثُمَّ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يُسۡجَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fī al-ḥamīmi thumma fī al-nāri yus'jarūna
